title: it is essential to consider the implementation of constant inventory monitoring using IoT cameras instead of relying solely on manual inventory counting.
text-1: Vieureka, the Edge AI camera, diligently monitors the inventory 24/7, 365 days a year, replacing the need for human presence.
text-2: The captured information is shared in the cloud, allowing real-time updating of the inventory movement in the database.
text-3: The cameras can recognize the location of items no matter where they are placed, enabling a free-address inventory management system.
